title: Worldclim current and future climate data
description: The Worldclim Collections consists of a set of global climate layers (climate grids) covering all global land areas except Antarctica. They are in the latitude / longitude coordinate reference system (not projected) and the datum is WGS84. The data layers were generated through interpolation of average monthly climate data from weather stations.
attribution: Hijmans, R.J., S.E. Cameron, J.L. Parra, P.G. Jones and A. Jarvis, 2005. Very high resolution interpolated climate surfaces for global land areas. International Journal of Climatology 25: 1965-1978.
